title: Barman

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
Serve Drink - Roleblock all of your target visitors. 2 uses.
Hand Drink - Roleblock the player that your target visited. 2 uses.
Open Bar - Redirect all of your target's visitors into yourself. 2 uses.

desc:
Post 1155
*I arm An. I am the B Arm An.*
